descriptionHtml:
THE ELDER SCROLL V 

S K Y R I M


Destruction Magic Textures
==========================

Version 1.1
- new name (thanks to philosopherking)
- ice normal texture : more bumped
- ice texture : more splashed
- burn texture : less saturated
- burn glow texture : less lighted
- burn normal texture : less bumped


Installation
------------
Extract the content of the \"textures\" folder into the \"Data\" folder. If you have previous versions installed, just replace all files with the new ones.

The new textures are : 
Data\\Textures\\impactdecals\\decalflameburn01.dds
Data\\Textures\\impactdecals\\decalflameburn01_g.dds
Data\\Textures\\impactdecals\\decalflameburn01_n.dds
Data\\Textures\\impactdecals\\decalfrostimpact01.dds
Data\\Textures\\impactdecals\\decalfrostimpact01_n.dds

Usage
-----
Do as you please.

:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
author: Canguilhem
